translations: （使）适应新环境（或气候）（acclimate 的过去式和过去分词）

sentences.sentence: I have not yet entirely acclimated.
The rice has been acclimated in this area.
sentences.translation: 水稻已能适应这一地区的环境。

sentences.sentence: It can take a week or two to get acclimated to hot weather.
sentences.translation: 要花费两个星期来适应高温的天气。
